title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 107.7 - Dealer demonstrator registration numbers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 107.7 - Dealer demonstrator registration numbers

State Regulations
(a) A snowmobile dealer shall receive two
snowmobile dealer demonstrator registration numbers. (b) Upon a showing of need for additional
snowmobile dealer demonstrator registration numbers, a snowmobile dealer shall
be eligible to purchase additional snowmobile dealer demonstrator registration
numbers. (c) Dealer demonstrator
registration numbers may be used in lieu of a snowmobile registration upon: (1)
any snowmobile which the dealer owns or
has on consignment and is demonstrating for a prospective purchaser or is
permitting a prospective purchaser to test drive; (2)
any snowmobile the dealer is testing to
determine its value prior to buying it. (d) Dealer demonstrator registration plates
may never be used on a snowmobile for which a charge is made for its
use. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
107.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
